DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Resumo das Atividades do Per?odo
Atividades
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Carga de Trabalho do Periodo por Departamento","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":"","WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":true,"showSubTitle":true,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]} ,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null} } ,"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select	dj.Id as [Id],
		dj.Oid as Oid,
        dj.Department as Department,
		dj.Division as Division,
		ccl.[Name] as ClientClassification,
		dj.Client as Client,
		dj.ClientId as ClientId,
		cc.HasImage as cHasImage,
		jc.[Name] as JobClassification,
		dj.Project as Project,
		dj.[NameAndExternalId] as Job,
		dj.[User] as CreatedBy,
		dj.UserId as CreatedById,
		u.HasImage as uHasImage,
		d.[Priority] as [Priority],
		dj.Effort as Effort,
		datediff(day, getdate(), dj.[Date]) as Days,
		dj.ProjectClassificationName as JobClassification,
		dj.[State] as Stage,
		cast(d.EntryDate as date) as StartDate,
		cast(dj.[Date] as Date) as EndDate,
		dj.[Date] as EndTime,
		d.ModifiedOn as LastActivity,
		(select	string_agg(convert(nvarchar(50), usr.Name), ',') from Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast, [User] usr where usr.Oid = ass.[User] and ass.DocumentOid = dj.Oid and ast.Name = 'Executor' and ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid) as Executor,
		(select string_agg(convert(nvarchar(50), ass.[User]), ',') from Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast where ass.DocumentOid = dj.Oid and ast.Name = 'Executor' and ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid) as ExecutorId,
		(select	string_agg(convert(nvarchar(50), usr.HasImage), ',') from Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast, [User] usr where usr.Oid = ass.[User] and ass.DocumentOid = dj.Oid and ast.Name = 'Executor' and ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid) as ExecutorImage,
		IsNull(ws.Color, wst.Color) as Color
from	Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj,
		Deliverable d left outer join JobClassification jc on jc.Oid = d.[Classification],
		[User] u,
		CommercialClient cc left outer join ClientClassification ccl on ccl.Oid = cc.ClientClassification,
		WorkflowState ws,
		WorkflowStateType wst
where	d.Oid = dj.Oid and
		dj.UserId = u.Oid and
		cc.Oid = dj.ClientId and 
		dj.StateId = ws.Oid and
		dj.StateTypeId = wst.Oid and
        dj.StateTypeCode in (2,3,4,5,11,13) and
		dj.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate and
		(dj.DivisionId = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')","mapping":""} } ,"Filters":{} ,"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0} ,"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate","Division"]} } ]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Horizonte Temporal
